name: Community Health Systems, Inc.
description: Community Health Systems, Inc. is a leading operator of general acute care hospitals and outpatient facilities in the United States. Established in 1985, the company is headquartered in Franklin, Tennessee, and has a mission to provide high-quality healthcare services in the communities it serves. Community Health Systems focuses on delivering a range of healthcare services, including inpatient and outpatient care, surgical services, and emergency services, through its network of hospitals. The company operates over 100 hospitals in various states, catering to millions of patients annually. Community Health Systems is dedicated to improving patient care and health outcomes by investing in health information technology, clinical initiatives, and patient safety programs. The company also emphasizes community health initiatives and partnerships to address local healthcare needs. In recent years, it has pursued strategic acquisitions and partnerships to expand its reach and enhance its service offerings, aiming to create a more integrated healthcare delivery system. With a focus on innovation and patient-centered care, Community Health Systems strives to adapt to the evolving healthcare landscape and meet the demands of its patients and communities.

seo.meta_title: Community Health Systems, Inc. | Leading Healthcare Provider
seo.meta_description: Explore Community Health Systems, Inc., a top operator of hospitals and healthcare facilities dedicated to improving patient care and community health.

faq.question: What is Community Health Systems known for?
faq.answer: Community Health Systems is known for operating a network of general acute care hospitals and healthcare facilities across the United States.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Community Health Systems?
faq.answer: Timothy L. Hingtgen is the CEO of Community Health Systems, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Community Health Systems headquartered?
faq.answer: Community Health Systems is headquartered in Franklin, Tennessee, USA.

faq.question: What types of services does Community Health Systems provide?
faq.answer: Community Health Systems provides inpatient and outpatient care, surgical services, and emergency services.

faq.question: When was Community Health Systems founded?
faq.answer: Community Health Systems was founded in 1985.
